directions: Whisk olive oil, rice vinegar, sherry vinegar, mayonnaise, salt, and black pepper in a bowl until smooth.
Place escarole, peach slices, goat cheese, and walnuts in a large bowl; drizzle in vinegar mixture and toss to coat.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 small head escarole, cut into 1-inch ribbons
title: Peach and Escarole Salad
